channel.title: CVE Feed for synth -- omniauth-microsoft_graph
channel.description: The latest CVEs for synth -- omniauth-microsoft_graph

item.title: CVE-2024-21632|2024-01-02T21:54:54.527Z -- synth -- omniauth-microsoft_graph
item.description: omniauth-microsoft_graph provides an Omniauth strategy for the Microsoft Graph API. Prior to versions 2.0.0, the implementation did not validate the legitimacy of the `email` attribute of the user nor did it give/document an option to do so, making it susceptible to nOAuth misconfiguration in cases when the `email` is used as a trusted user identifier. This could lead to account takeover. Version 2.0.0 contains a fix for this issue.
